title: Integrated Marketing Communication (IMC) Practical Mastery Course: Language Strategy and Text Analysis-Centric

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic marketing theories and communication principles, ability to utilize basic grammatical structures and specialized terminology. Experience with text analysis tools and foundational data-driven decision-making skills
context.additional_context: Experiencing real client projects in a virtual reality environment, with practice-centered learning utilizing smartphone-based VR tools. Developing and evaluating language expression strategies that reflect cultural contexts when designing community campaigns. Supporting improvements in learners' expressive and reading comprehension skills through peer feedback sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can simulate the planning-execution-evaluation process of IMC strategies in a virtual environment with over 85% accuracy using real brand cases, while developing text mining and linguistic pattern analysis skills for target audience analysis. This includes strategy formulation using vocabulary extraction and sentiment analysis from consumer reviews.

In team-based VR projects, five core competencies (e.g., leadership, creative planning, digital channel management) can be measured via learner competency assessment tables. Additionally, learners can develop a language style guide for brand message consistency, strengthening skills in applying grammar structures and specialized terminology aligned with brand tone and manner.

Learners can collaborate with local community clients (e.g., welfare centers, neighborhood communities) to execute an IMC campaign within three months, deriving quantitative data such as participant survey responses (70%+ response rate) and campaign goal achievement rates (80%+). They can also enhance professional terminology usage and persuasive language skills for campaign reports, applying writing and reading strategies that reflect cultural contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
